sec.title: Authors’ contributions
sec.p: AD designed the study, initiated the data collection and wrote the first draft of the paper with MH. RP, SPM and MH contributed to the data extraction, the creation of the database and the data analysis. AF advised on study methods and revised the draft paper. All authors approved the final version of the paper.

sec.title: Authors’ information
sec.p: Anneliese Depoux- Co-director of Centre Virchow-Villermé, Paris, University of Sorbonne Paris Cité. She earned her doctorate in Information and Communications Science from the University of Paris Sorbonne CELSA and is a research fellow at the GRIPIC. She initiated with Stefanie Schütte an interdisciplinary research group dedicated to study how to communicate on climate change and health: 4CHealth.
